sources.title: Dangerous Charter (1962) Adventure, Thriller | Chris Warfield, Sally Fraser | Full Movie, subtitles
sources.description:
A nerve-shattering voyage with death lurking at every turn!
The crew of a fishing boat discovers a deserted luxury yacht at sea with a dead body on board. They claim the yacht as salvage, not knowing that a drug smuggling ring has hidden $500,000 worth of heroin on the boat.

Original Title: Dangerous Charter (1962) 
Director: Robert Gottschalk
Writers: Paul Strait, Robert Gottschalk
Actors: Chris Warfield, Sally Fraser, Dick Foote, Peter Forster
Genres: Classics, Adventure, Thriller, Psychotronic

00:00 Full Movie
00:04  A group of people explore a boat called Medusa and find strange and interesting things on board.
15:52  A mysterious yacht with no registry and a dead man on board is brought in by two men who hope to claim salvage, but the authorities are unable to trace the owner or determine what happened.
19:29  A group of individuals discuss a fisherman named Anselmo who is suspected of being a smuggler and is connected to the yacht Medusa.
24:37  A man named Cain charters a boat called Medusa and hires Marty McMahon and his crew to take him to La Paz.
31:16  A man goes missing on a ship and is later found in the engine room.
40:48  Richard is confronted by Mr. Manay who claims to have no interest in the Medusa but offers $10,000 in exchange for a trip to Catalina.
46:43  A man confesses to abandoning a crew member at sea and threatens to harm others on the boat.
54:57  A group of people on a boat are involved in smuggling narcotics and plan to transfer the cargo to a cabin cruiser.
1:08:42  A bomb is discovered on a cruise ship, leading to chaos and a dramatic ending.
